640680.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rome (BRP)
640680.description:
BRP Rome

An Adventure Module for use with the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop

Silver Ennie for the 'Best setting' category at the ENnies Awards 2010!
The Life and Death of the Republic
The Ransom and The Promise by Ken Spencer feature the plague of piracy in the Mediterranean,
with the frequent taking of hostages and the necessity to reassert the supremacy
of Rome over the seagoing scum. But the players will soon discover that the Eternal
City hosts subtle, yet more hazardous, kinds of threats.
In The Sacrilege by Pete Nash the players will face an obscure intrigue and ethical
dilemmas, in a mystery adventure involving a mixture of passion, religion and treachery.
The Invasion by Conall Kavanagh takes our adventurers to the most daring of Caesar's
military adventures: the invasion of Britain. Will the characters, used to Roman
politics, find their way in the dangerous arena of Briton tribal intrigues?
Run as a mini campaign, or used as single adventures, these scenarios offer exciting
and deadly experiences - including riots, battles and the inevitable skulduggery
of Republican Rome!
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the BRP ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Basic Roleplaying (BRP) ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
